about_the_game:
Epic Multiplayer TPS Experience

Unrest offers players a breathtaking multiplayer TPS experience, with two teams of 5 players each in the main game mode, totaling 10 players. Take your place in the epic battle between humans and creatures!

Colonist Invaders

Colonists are brave humans who venture into the galaxy to establish colonies on various planets. Clash against the resistance with unique abilities and special equipment possessed by each class to secure victory!

Resistant Homeowners

Though the creature team may appear aggressive, they are simply defending their homes! Showcase the power of the indigenous race, comprised of mighty creatures fighting to defend their planet, each equipped with various abilities, reminding humans who these lands belong to!

Invasion and Defense

An extraordinary narrative unfolds as humans take on the role of invading colonists, while native creatures fight to protect their planet against human invasion, turning into a thrilling battle! Protect or destroy equipment in three different zones, advancing your team towards victory step by step!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690K or AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 Super or AMD Radeon RX 5700-XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
